summary:
I am an interdisciplinary researcher with experience in psychology, cognitive neuroscience and molecular biology. My mission is to further contribute to the research of mindfulness and to make the practice of mindfulness easily accessible in Croatia where it is still very uncommon. 

Ako ste iz Hrvatske ili iz regije, ovdje mo≈æete odmah isprobati besplatnu poduku mindfulnessa sa mnom u formi ≈†estodnevnog mindfulness izazova: https://mindfulnesscentarsplit.com/izazov
